title: Set Up Conversion Tracking
description: For a new website, a marketer needs to set up conversion tracking to measure form submissions.

tasks.description: Create a new 'thank you' page that users are redirected to after submitting the form.
Create a new 'destination' goal in Google Analytics that tracks views of the 'thank you' page.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sets up the goal in Google Analytics.

tasks.description: Import the new goal into Google Ads to enable conversion tracking for ad campaigns.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully links Google Analytics and Google Ads for conversion tracking.
